metadata.title: CVE-2020-27067 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the l2tp subsystem, there is a possible use after free due to a racecondition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with Systemexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-152409173

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
